author: vanbesien
body:
Forward port: Pull request for 7_4_X

Bug fix corresponding to the HyperNews thread: "Segmentation violation reco jobs MWGR9 - CMSSW_7_2_3"
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/edmFramework/3408

Getting the "lvl1ID" from the HCAL FED instead of the Trigger/TCDS FED.
title: Using Hcal FED instead of trigger FED to get HL1Id
